title: TCS signs five-year partnership with Sydney Marathon
description: TCS did not disclose the financials of the partnership. This is the latest marathon to be added to TCS's portfolio. The TCS Sydney Marathon is part of the larger running events including four World Marathon Major races in New York, London, Chicago and Boston, alongside marathons in Amsterdam, Mumbai, Singapore and Toronto.
content: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), India’s largest IT services provider, has added another marathon to its portfolio with the announcement of a five-year title partnership with the Sydney Marathon, Australia’s largest marathon.
